title: Bug 14113 - Incorrect Handling of FSOURCEATTACHED and FSOURCEDETACHED Java Deltas
description: The current behavior involves firing a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta when changing the attached source of a JAR, which is incorrect. As a result, the UI closes class file editors for this JAR, which is appropriate for a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH delta. Attempts to fix the delta by using (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) have been unsuccessful.
OB: Build 20020416: When changing the attached source of a JAR, a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta is fired, leading to the UI closing class file editors for the affected JAR.
EB: The expected behavior is for the system to correctly recognize (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) java deltas and react accordingly without closing class file editors.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Change the attached source of a JAR.
2. Observe the firing of a FREMOVEDFROMCLASSPATH java delta.
3. Attempt to fix the delta by making it a (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta.
4. Notice that the UI does not react appropriately to the (FSOURCEDETACHED | FSOURCEATTACHED) delta.
